application.name: FTP TODAY - Hosted Secure File Sharing

presentation.summary: FTP Today is a robust, multi-user hosted (SaaS) FTP, FTPS, SFTP and HTTPS application for managing secure file transfer and secure file sharing with external users
presentation.description:
FTP Today offers private and secure file transfer/sharing via a Hosted Software-as-a-Service model with a highly-configurable control panel. Supports multi-user FTPS, SFTP, HTTPS and FTP connections—more than any other file sharing application or service. Granular settings protect what each user can see and access. Unique upload, download, delete and directory listing privileges can be set by user (per folder). Multiple administrator roles and accounts, user authentications by password or SSH key authentication, branded web FTP client, email notifications, auto-delete and auto-suspend triggers, and much more.
Note: This is a HOSTED service requiring a paid subscription. All FTP user accounts and files are managed on FTP Today’s PRIVATE and SECURE FTP CLOUD.
